languages.text: {n}Мужчина удивленно поправляет маску, еще раз обшаривает толпу взглядом. И безошибочно останавливается на девушке в изысканном платье.{/n} "Это же Ренка, моя дворовая. Но откуда... Она защищает меня? Глупышка не понимает, в какие игры ввязалась. Прости меня, девочка..." {n}Губы мужчины дрожат, он крепче сжимает трость, набирает в грудь побольше воздуха и вдруг делает шаг назад.{/n}

{n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? She has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина удивленно поправляет маску, еще раз обшаривает толпу взглядом. И безошибочно останавливается на девушке в изысканном платье.{/n} "Это же Ренка, моя дворовая. Но откуда... Она защищает меня? Глупышка не понимает, в какие игры ввязалась. Прости меня, девочка..." {n}Губы мужчины дрожат, он крепче сжимает трость, набирает в грудь побольше воздуха и вдруг делает шаг назад.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? The ninny has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}

{n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and stop right on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka. My house servant. What is she... Protecting me, you say? The poor girl has no idea what she has gotten herself into..." {n}His eyes tear up.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人惊讶地调整了一下脸上的面具。他的目光扫过了人群，最终落在了那位衣着考究的年轻女子身上。{/n}“她是莲卡，我的女仆。她到底在……你是说，她在保护我吗？她根本不知道这会给她惹上什么麻烦。原谅我吧，姑娘……”{n}他的嘴唇颤抖着，手中的手杖握得更紧了。他深深地吸了口气，之后猛地退了一步。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? She has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人惊讶地调整了一下脸上的面具。他的目光扫过了人群，最终落在了那位衣着考究的年轻女子身上。{/n}“她是莲卡，我的女仆。她到底在……你是说，她在保护我吗？她根本不知道这会给她惹上什么麻烦。原谅我吧，姑娘……”{n}他的嘴唇颤抖着，手中的手杖握得更紧了。他深深地吸了口气，之后猛地退了一步。{/n}
{n}老人惊讶地调整了一下脸上的面具。他的目光扫过了人群，最终落在了那位衣着考究的年轻女子身上。{/n}“她是莲卡，我的女仆。她到底在……你是说，她在保护我吗？这个蠢姑娘啊，她根本不知道这会给她惹上什么麻烦。原谅我吧，姑娘……”{n}他的嘴唇颤抖着，手中的手杖握得更紧了。他深深地吸了口气，之后猛地退了一步。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人は驚いて仮面を直した。彼の目は再び群衆を見渡し、やがて華やかな衣装をまとった若い女性の上で止まった。{/n}「あれは私の使用人のレンカです。彼女が何を…私を守っていると？彼女は、自分がどんなゲームに巻き込まれているのか全く分かっていないのですよ。娘よ、許してくれ…」{n}彼は唇を震わせながら杖をより強く握りしめ、深く息を吸い込む。そして、突然一歩後ろに下がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? She has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は驚いて仮面を直した。彼の目は再び群衆を見渡し、やがて華やかな衣装をまとった若い女性の上で止まった。{/n}「あれは私の使用人のレンカです。彼女が何を…私を守っていると？あの馬鹿は、自分がどんなゲームに巻き込まれているのか全く分かっていないのですよ。娘よ、許してくれ…」{n}彼は唇を震わせながら杖をより強く握りしめ、深く息を吸い込む。そして、突然一歩後ろに下がった。{/n}
{n}老人は驚いて仮面を直した。彼の目は再び群衆を見渡し、やがて華やかな衣装をまとった若い女性の上で止まった。{/n}「あれは私の使用人のレンカです。彼女が何を…私を守っていると？あの馬鹿は、自分がどんなゲームに巻き込まれているのか全く分かっていないのですよ。娘よ、許してくれ…」{n}彼は唇を震わせながら杖をより強く握りしめ、深く息を吸い込む。そして、突然一歩後ろに下がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El viejo se ajusta la máscara, sorprendido. Su mirada recorre la multitud una vez más hasta posarse en la muchacha del vestido elegante.{/n} «Esa es Renka, mi sirviente doméstica. ¿Qué está... dice que quiere protegerme? No tiene ni idea del lío en el que se está metiendo. Perdóname, muchacha...». {n}Con labios temblorosos, aprieta su bastón e inspira profundamente antes de dar un repentino paso atrás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? She has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}

No tiene ni idea del lío en el que se está metiendo. Perdóname, muchacha...». {n}Con labios temblorosos, aprieta su bastón e inspira profundamente antes de dar un repentino paso atrás.{/n}

{n}El viejo se ajusta la máscara, sorprendido. Su mirada recorre la multitud una vez más hasta posarse en la muchacha del vestido elegante.{/n} «Esa es Renka, mi sirviente doméstica. ¿Qué está... dice que quiere protegerme? La muy boba no tiene ni idea del lío en el que se está metiendo. Perdóname, muchacha...». {n}Con labios temblorosos, aprieta su bastón e inspira profundamente antes de dar un repentino paso atrás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adam, şaşkınlıkla maskesini düzeltiyor. Gözleri kalabalığı tekrar tarıyor ve zarif giyimli genç kadına dönüyor.{/n} "Hanemin hizmetkârı Renka. Burada ne işi... Beni mi koruyor? Neye bulaştığının farkında değil. Affet evladım..." {n}Bastonunu sıkıca kavrayıp derin bir nefes alıyor. Sonrasında aniden geri adım atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? She has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı adam, şaşkınlıkla maskesini düzeltiyor. Gözleri kalabalığı tekrar tarıyor ve zarif giyimli genç kadına dönüyor.{/n} "Hanemin hizmetkârı Renka. Burada ne işi... Beni mi koruyor? Neye bulaştığının farkında değil. Affet evladım..." {n}Bastonunu sıkıca kavrayıp derin bir nefes alıyor. Sonrasında aniden geri adım atıyor.{/n}

{n}Yaşlı adam, şaşkınlıkla maskesini düzeltiyor. Gözleri kalabalığı tekrar tarıyor ve zarif giyimli genç kadına dönüyor.{/n} "Hanemin hizmetkârı Renka. Burada ne işi... Beni mi koruyor? Ahmak çocuk, neye bulaştığının farkında değil. Affet evladım..." {n}Bastonunu sıkıca kavrayıp derin bir nefes alıyor. Sonrasında aniden geri adım atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme surpris ajuste son masque. Ses yeux balaient la foule, puis se posent sur la jeune femme élégamment vêtue.{/n} « C'est Renka, ma servante. Elle me protège, dites-vous ? Elle n'a pas la moindre idée du jeu dans lequel elle s'est embarquée. Pardonne-moi, ma fille... » {n}Sa lèvre tremble et sa main se resserre un peu plus sur le pommeau de sa canne. Il inspire à fond, avant de reculer brusquement d'un pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? She has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme surpris ajuste son masque. Ses yeux balaient la foule, puis se posent sur la jeune femme élégamment vêtue.{/n} « C'est Renka, ma servante. Elle me protège, dites-vous ? Elle n'a pas la moindre idée du jeu dans lequel elle s'est embarquée. Pardonne-moi, ma fille... » {n}Sa lèvre tremble et sa main se resserre un peu plus sur le pommeau de sa canne. Il inspire à fond, avant de reculer brusquement d'un pas.{/n}

{n}Le vieil homme surpris ajuste son masque. Ses yeux balaient la foule, puis se posent sur la jeune femme élégamment vêtue.{/n} « C'est Renka, ma servante. Elle me protège, dites-vous ? Cette idiote n'a pas la moindre idée du jeu dans lequel elle s'est embarquée. Pardonne-moi, ma fille... » {n}Sa lèvre tremble et sa main se resserre un peu plus sur le pommeau de sa canne. Il inspire à fond, avant de reculer brusquement d'un pas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann rückt überrascht seine Maske zurecht. Sein Blick mustert erneut die Menge und landet schließlich auf der vornehm gekleideten jungen Frau.{/n} "Das ist Renka, meine Hausdienerin. Und sie ... beschützt mich, sagt Ihr? Sie hat doch keine Ahnung, in was für ein Spiel sie da hineingeraten ist. Ich bitte um Vergebung, Mädchen ..." {n}Seine Lippen zittern, als er seinen Stock fester umfasst und tief einatmet, bevor er plötzlich einen Schritt zurücktritt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man adjusts his mask in surprise. His eyes scan the crowd again and come to rest on the finely dressed young woman.{/n} "That's Renka, my house servant. What is she— Protecting me, you say? She has no idea what game she's got herself mixed up in. Forgive me, my girl..." {n}His lip quivers as he grips his cane more tightly and breathes in deeply, before suddenly taking a step back.{/n}
